title: Book on Medievalism
description:
I recently read the book "Angels in the Architecture" by Douglas Jones and Douglas Wilson. This book was, by all means, earth-shaking. I usually do not plan to devote entire podcast episodes to a single book, but this one deserves it. In this episode, I talk about the book, some of the concepts therein, and the ramifications that it would have if we took Medievalism seriously. 

Buy this book now: https://www.amazon.com/Angels-Architecture-Protestant-Vision-Middle/dp/1885767404/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=angels+in+the+architecture&qid=1619116539&sr=8-1

This is episode 11 of my podcast. 

Make sure to like and subscribe!

Check out my podcast: Fining Ideas | The Colton Kirby Show: https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

--Links--
My Website: https://www.coltonkirby.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Parler: https://parler.com/profile/coltonkirby/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_coltonkirby/
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/
Quora: https://www.quora.com/profile/Colton-Kirby-7
